title: 93 (number)
text:
93 (ninety-three) is the <a href="natural%20number">natural number</a> following <a href="92%20%28number%29">92</a> and preceding <a href="94%20%28number%29">94</a>.
In mathematics.
93 is:
There are 93 different <a href="cyclic%20permutation">cyclic</a> <a href="Gilbreath%20permutation">Gilbreath permutation</a>s on 11 elements, and therefore there are 93 different <a href="real%20number">real</a> periodic points of order 11 on the <a href="Mandelbrot%20set">Mandelbrot set</a>.
In other fields.
Ninety-three is:
In classical Persian <a href="finger%20counting">finger counting</a>, the number 93 is represented by a closed fist. Because of this, classical Arab and Persian poets around 1 CE referred to someone's lack of generosity by saying that the person's hand made "ninety-three".
